Introduction
This topic contains information on the eligibility requirements for the annual clothing allowance, including
ACAP eligibility requirements
medical evidence needed to establish eligibility
jurisdiction of clothing allowance claims processing
informing Veterans of potential eligibility for the annual clothing allowance
what constitutes a claim for the annual clothing allowance
, and
annual clothing allowance eligibility for hospitalized Veterans
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 8, Section A - Clothing Allowance
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 8, Section A
